item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * Updated chinese translation (by Clazex) * Add option to use query inbuilt Irony fonts and not query system fonts at all
CHANGES FROM v1.14: * Updated dependencies * Fix segfault CTD on certain Linux (openSUSE) configurations * Update for Stellaris 3.0
